com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.examples.consumer

Class TunnelStreamHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.examples.consumer.TunnelStreamHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TunnelStreamDefaultMsgCallback, TunnelStreamStatusEventCallback

    public class TunnelStreamHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements TunnelStreamStatusEventCallback, TunnelStreamDefaultMsgCallback
    This is the tunnel stream handler for the UPA Value Add consumer application. It sends and receives basic text messages over a tunnel stream. It only supports one ReactorChannel/TunnelStream.
